name: GRAMEENA PRATHISTHANA

briefDescription: GRAMEENA PRATHISTHANA WORKING TOWARDS INTEGRATED RURAL DEVELOPMENT IN SELECTED  30 BACKWARD VILLAGES AND TOWNS OF TUMKUR,BENGALURU DISTS. PARTICULARLY ILLITERATE POOR WOMEN AS WE ARE WOMEN MANAGED TRUST. WE HAVE ABOUT 5K MEMBERS ON LIST. SINCE LAST 1 DECADE WE HAVE ADOPTED HULLEKERE AND TRYING TO IMPROVE ITS SOCIO-ECONOMIC STATUS BY CREATING AWARENESS ON EDUCATION, HEALTH, DEMOCRACY, EMANCIPATION OF WOMEN TO REMOVE GENDER BIAS. WE HAVE ALSO ADOPTED THE 110 YEARS OLD GOVT. SCHOOL AND HELPING THE 200 STUDENTS FOR OVERALL DEVELOPMENT.
